metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39252 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A crafted NTFS image can cause an out-of-bounds read in ntfs_ie_lookup in NTFS-3G < 2021.8.22.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-39252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libntfs-3g883 - 1:2017.3.23AR.3-3ubuntu5
ntfs-3g - 1:2017.3.23AR.3-3ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2017.3.23AR.3-3ubuntu5').
